description: The corpse of a long-dead colonist.  Near perfectly preserved by the merciless cold.
The irreparably broken remains of a Sentinel-lx.  Could be gutted for valuable parts.
This bloodhound won't be chasing anyone anymore.  Could be gutted for parts.
A broken Seneschal, now limp and unmoving.  Could be gutted for parts or crafted into a salvaged robot.

name: broken Likvidator
description: A broken Likvidator, now limp and unmoving.  Could be gutted for parts or crafted into a salvaged robot.
A broken Famulus, now silent and mangled.  If it wasn't for the obvious rivets and welding, it would look completely human.  Could be stripped down for parts.

name: broken Udarnik
description: A broken Udarnik, now wrecked and immobile.  Could be stripped down for parts.

name: broken Brandspojt
description: A broken Brandspojt, now cold and inert.  Could be stripped down for parts.

name: broken rat snatcher
description: A broken rat snatcher, now harmless and inert.  Could be stripped down or re-crafted.

name: broken grab-bot
description: A broken grabber robot, now limp and nonthreatening.  Could be stripped down or re-crafted.

name: broken pest hunter
description: A broken pest hunter, now harmless and inert.  Could be gutted for parts or re-crafted.

name: broken Imaginifer
description: A broken military humaniform, shattered and inert.  While it looks nowhere near human, you still feel uneasy - as if it is studying you with its eyes.  Could be stripped for parts.

name: broken Hashashiyyin
description: A broken Hashashiyyin, shattered and inert.  While it looks nowhere near human, you still feel uneasy - as if it is studying you with its eyes.  Could be stripped for parts.

name: broken Suppressor
description: A broken Suppressor, shattered and inert.  Could be stripped for parts.

name: broken floating heater
description: A broken floating heater, now cold and motionless.  Could be stripped down or re-crafted.
A broken defense robot.  Could be gutted for parts or crafted into a salvaged robot.

name: broken disarmed advanced robot
description: A broken advanced robot.  Its internal weapons have been removed.  Could be gutted for parts or crafted into a salvaged robot.

name: broken advanced robot
description: A broken advanced robot.  This one is armed with an integrated laser-emitter.  Could be stripped for parts.

name: broken Irradiant
description: The irreparably broken remains of an Irradiant weapons platform.  Its mounted plasma cannon self-destructed when the robot was rendered inoperable, but its remains could still be disassembled for some valuable parts.
The broken shell of an Isohypsa drone coordinator.  Most of its sensors and AI units are charred beyond any repair.
A broken Kabura-ya drone.  Could be disassembled for a meager amount of parts.

name: broken advanced robot
description: A broken advanced robot.  This one is armed with an integrated EMP projector.  Could be stripped for parts.

name: broken disarmed military bot
description: A broken defense robot.  Its internal weapons have been removed.  Could be gutted for parts or crafted into a salvaged robot.

name: broken disarmed defense bot
description: A broken defense robot.  Its internal weapons have been removed.  Could be gutted for parts or crafted into a salvaged robot.

name: broken surgical droid
description: A broken surgical robot, now crumpled and inert.  Could be stripped down for parts.
A broken eyebot.  Much less threatening now that it won't be calling for backup.  Could be gutted for parts.
A broken police bot.  Much less threatening now that it's quiet and still.  Could be gutted for parts.
A broken riot control bot.  Much less threatening now that it's out of gas.  Could be gutted for parts.
